Text: Question on Savings Comparison request Cc Tracy What exactly am I supposed to be providing for this request There hasnt been a lot of guidance provided to me for this and Im not really sure what savings were talking about Any clarification you can provide me would be appreciated Thanks Phil Original Message From Botello Mary Sent Tuesday November PM To Barnes Caroline Concklin Elaine Gilbert Steve Keiser John Moore Jan Boggs Phil Cc Jones Dana Carpenter Nancy Krone Amy Hsieh Sally Jesse III John Subject Savings Comparison In order to measure the savings on a monthly as well as legal entity basis we have added two tabs to the file sent earlier this week and modified the original tabs Please complete the tabs with the monthly spend of your original Plan can be total yr divided by for gross and net for each of your functions The totals should feed to the tabs containing your new numbers You can send all the data in one file on Monday or you can send the first file for Monday and this new version on Tuesday Please contact me should you have any questions
